description:
6th Avenue Honda (new Hondas and used cars) is currently seeking Top candidates to grow with us!! If you are coachable, dependable and honest with a great work ethic, we would love to visit with you. Must have a valid drivers license and dependable transportation to get to and from work.

We currently have several full time positions available and all come with a benefits package to include: Paid Vacation, optional 401k and health insurance.

Our hours are Monday through Friday, from 9am to 7pm and closed on Sundays. This fulltime position is a 5 day work week with Sunday off along with another day during the week.

Our average Sales Consultant sells 10 a month and average income is $45k a year.

This position does offer a signing bonus of up to $3k.

Interested candidates should apply at or website (log onto our website and then click careers): www.6thAvenueHonda.com
